item.title: AVD Azure AD SSO
item.description: How to enable Azure Virtual Desktop Hybrid single sign-on. login into the Azure Portal. Go to Azure Virtual Desktop. Open one of the created hostpools. Select RDP Properties. Configure : RDP will attempt to use Azure AD authentication to sign in Go to the advanced tab. The property that has been added is : enablerdsaadauth:i:1 Configure Azure AD Keberos Azure AD Kerberos # First, ensure TLS 1.2 for PowerShell gallery access.
